name: Strengthen Concentrated Conditioner for Dry, Damaged Hair
about: What it is: The fermented fix for damaged hair, this silicone-free conditioner is designed to minimize breakage, smooth frizz + boost shine. Ultra-concentrated so you only need half your usual amount..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Drryness.- Frizz.Key Benefits:.- Repairs damaged hair and minimizes breakage.- Reduces frizz and boosts shine.- Silicone-free nourishment wonu2019t weigh down hair.Highlighted Ingredients:.- Patent-Pending Rootbiomic Ferment: Nutrient-rich superbrew for anchored roots, balanced scalp + healthy hair..- Bio-Peptides (Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein): Target collagen and keratin to help fortify strands from root to tip..- Coconut Oil and Sodium PCA: Pulls moisture deep into hair instead of coating itu2014for real nourishment..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know: This nourishing, reparative conditioner is fermented to feed roots, scalp + hair the needed nutrition for next-level damage repair, frizz control and shine. Made with no added water, this formula is less wasteful, more powerful and ultra-concentrated, making this bottle equivalent to one two times its size..Fragrance Description: This conditioner has The Rootistu2019s signature fragrance, a collaboration with one of the worldu2019s top clean fragrance houses. Inspired by their warm brand aesthetic, this complex, fresh, fizzy floral has a grounding touch of soft woods for balance, depth, and grace. Intoxicating but never overwhelming, transport your senses to a garden stroll at golden hour where dreams take root..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Proprietary Rootbiomic Ferment: Promote anchored roots, balanced scalp, and visibly stronger, healthier hair..-Bio-Peptides (Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein): Rich in collagen, keratin, and proteins to help strengthen from root to tip..-Coconut Oil and Sodium PCA: Pulls moisture deep into hair instead of coating itu2014for real nourishment...Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lactobacillus/(Centella Asiatica/Coffee Seed/Ganoderma.Lucidum/Hops/Panax Ginseng Root/Scutellaria Baicalensis Root) Extract/Pea Extract/Rice Seed Extract Ferment Filtrate, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Brassica Alcohol*, Lactic Acid, Vinegar, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Disunfloweroylethyl Dimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Brassicyl Valinate Esylate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Inulin, Sodium PCA, Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Oil, Sunflower Seed Oil Glycerides, Polyglycerin-3, Polyglyceryl-3 Lactate/Laurate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Calcium Gluconate, Butylene Glycol, Lauryl Lactyl Lactate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Limonene, Fragrance/Parfum. ..*Conditioning Agent..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing, dispense half your usual amount of conditioner into your wet palm. .-Massage directly into wet hair from the ears down..-Rinse well..-You can always add more conditioner, if desired, but this formula is specially designed to do more with less... Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse and recycle the aluminum bottle and transfer the reusable pump to your prefill.

Left my hair feel silky but with good volume. It has a slightly weird vinegar smell, but it wasn't terribly offensive and faded immediately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never seen a concentrated conditioner, let alone a concentrated conditioner with bio-peptide and rootbiomic ferment, but I have to say I am very impressed with the qualities and benefits it features like its eco-friendly recyclable packaging. I have wavy hair that is prone to frizziness and dryness while having a bunch of little hairs towards the top of my head from breakage. It has a thick, creamy texture that spreads evenly throughout my hair and a beautiful warm scent that is the perfect balance of floral and woody notes that have a tendency to stick around for a while which is a big plus for me. Now the texture is a little tricky in the sense that you will feel like your hair is soaking it up so quickly that you should add more but trust me don't do that as it will leave your hair feeling heavy and weighed down so remember a little goes a long way. Since I've been using this conditioner, I have noticed a difference with the strength of my hair as well as with the thickness and amount of fall-out I experience. It's also great for keeping my scalp balanced and my hair protected from further damage while also taming some of my frizz and leaving it more manageable. Overall, I'm super happy with how strong and healthy my hair is becoming and think with consistent use, I will see even more results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Interesting conditioner. Unlike many other conditioners this has no added water and is instead infused with superfood Rootbiomic Ferment, a product created by The Rootist. Because there is no added water you use 1/2 of the amount of your regular conditioner and place it on hair from the ears down to the ends of hair. Its easy to work into hair/easy to rinse. Lightweight. Detangles well. Softens and shines. Strengthens hair. Has a light scent that fades quickly. It does relax my natural waves a bit. Overall, it is a good conditioner safe for all hair types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had some hesitation when trying this conditioner because of its concentrated formula. I was concerned I would not be able to spread it evenly through my hair since conditioners don't usually emulsify. I didn't really have that big of an issue with disbursing it through the ends of my hair, but I still felt like I needed to use more than I should. I do love it the sustainable idea behind this product and I love the packaging, but that is really the only thing about this I was impressed with. I felt like it wasn't hydrating enough for my hair and it did not leave my hair as soft as other conditioners, I would say my hair was frizzier than usual. One other small complaint I have is that because it is concentrated it is in a much smaller container, but BARELY too big for TSA.

I love the sustainability of this conditioner, so I gave it 3 stars, but it didn't work for me. My hair will be silky before I put this on, and it will end up feeling rough and tangled after I wash this out. I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The  The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner is a great way to tame the frizz and leave your hair so soft. reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner is a great product! I have been a Licensed Cosmetologist for over 17 years and hair is one of my many specialties. I have super thick, coarse, color treated hair and struggle to find conditioners that are not too heavy on my hair. This conditioner is definitely concentrated and a little bit goes a long way. It helped to tame my frizz as well which was nice. It has a very pleasant clean almost citrusy scent to it. I also have very sensitive skin and it didnu2019t cause any irritation. The size of this conditioner makes it super easy for travel. Also, I would recommend saving the little plastic piece to put back on for travel too. I would highly recommend this conditioner for anyone looking for a good clean vegan conditioner.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner is small but it works wonders! I have thick, curly hair and I live in a very dry climate. I usually have to use a handful of different conditioners to coat my hair for a soft result. This Peptide Conditioner somehow is very thick. You donu2019t need a lot of it at all. After washing my hair, I separate it into a few sections. I then place a very small amount of the conditioner on the various sections. I do suggest taking the time to really work then product on your strands. Also, the directions state to apply the conditioner to the lengths of the hair, past the ears. Iu2019m not quite sure why but I definitely followed the directions and am pleased with the results. Itu2019s a fresh scent, not overbearing. I let the conditioner sit on my hair for about 15-20 mins. I detangle it and then rinse. My hair is kind of shiny afterwards but definitely has a clean, pure feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: A lot in a little package!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty professional and expert with over 27 years in the industry.  As a makeup artist and medical aesthetician who has managed luxury makeup counters and salons throughout my career,   Not surprisingly, I have an appreciation for products that tout ingredients specifically focused on the benefits the product claims it will do.  And even though I am a sucker for packaging design, it is apparent when care and consideration have been taken with every detail.  There are so many beauty products avaliable now, it's best to stand out.  The Rootist's Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner definitely checks all the boxes above.  What I particularly love is how the name tells you exactly what it is, the main active ingredient, and what it does.    Years of pulling my hair up, frequently dying it, and internal changes from simply aging has had its effect on my hair.  Damage through breakage and hair dye reflects in my fine hair now being see-through around the front and sides of my hairline.    After only two weeks, I am seeing tons of shine where before it was dull.  I am also feeling the elasticity of my hair increase, so it is noticeably stronger.  And because it is concentrated and I use half as much conditioner as I normally would, this small bottle is lasting much longer than I thought it might.   I'm excited to recommend this conditioner (and shampoo!) if you're expereincing weak, brittle hair with breakage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner in exchange for my honest review. Much like the matching Strengthen shampoo, this is a concentrated conditioner. This means using less product amount! As an esthetician, I am a fan of peptides for strengthening and repairing skin; so I was excited to try this product! I have wavy hair with some curl pattern to it, and hydrating conditioners are a MUST. I found this conditioner to be hydrating but not to the point where it weighed my hair down. My hair feels soft and looks stronger, and I feel like Iu2019ve experienced less breakage. Much like the shampoo, my only qualm is the price for amount of product. But, it IS concentrated and less product will be used. And itu2019s worth trying if youu2019re looking to repair your hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to concentrated hair products and kept feeling the need to go in for more conditioner as I have very fine and dry hair from over processing.  So, upon my initial application of first using the rootist concentrated shampoo I then naturally followed up with the concentrated conditioner.  I did go in for a second application initially but was determined by my second hair wash in using these products, to really try this as the directions indicated by using u00bd the usual amount of product.  I found that if I actually worked the product into my hair and scalp and left it on for at least a couple of minutes that the conditioner really does change the texture and feel of the hair into a more soft and silky texture.  I also found that as long as I didnu2019t over rinse my hair that it felt really great after using. It was less frizzy upon drying and felt silky and soft.   This last July we had our water softening unit in our home break when our hot water heater burst.  This has changed the quality of our water by far and I felt the rootist concentrated hair products have really out in this department.  So, if you have hard water or water with lots of added minerals, I did find this improved my hair immensely.  As an aesthetician I appreciate the skin loving ingredients to promote a healthy microbiome within the scalp.  With ingredients to strengthen weak damaged hair.  Ginseng, Hops, and rice to stimulate healthy hair growth and soften brittle hair.  Aloe, coconut and lactic acid to moisturize dry hair and promote balance.  Added hydrolyzed yeast protein is added to create better volume as it aids in the hairs strength by preventing breakage. Our hair is made up of about 95% protein or amino acids called keratin.  When we over process our hair through chemical treatments such as coloring and bleaching, along-side other daily factors of pollutants, weather, heat etc., our hair becomes damaged and weak needing protein to repair and replenish the damaged strands. As with any

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With my curly hair, conditioner is an absolute MUST for me. I was excited to try the Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner. This conditioner smells really nice. Itu2019s like a light floral scent that isnu2019t overpowering at all. Once your hair is dried, there is a nice scent to your hair but itu2019s not strong. This conditioner states to only use half the amount in which I did but I still felt like I needed my normal amount. This is very concentrated so I see why we only need half the amount but half the amount didnu2019t cut it on my curly hair. In the shower it felt a little drying so I thought I wouldnu2019t like this at all. This conditioner, just like the shampoo, feels amazing once your hair is dried. My hair looked silky and felt soft to the touch. This product contains many different oils and peptides known to strengthen and soften the hair so if it made my curly hair feel soft, this would be even more amazing on straighter hair as well. Smell and feel of the hair checks off the boxes on my list so Iu2019ll keep this conditioner in rotation along with the shampoo. Good product.

reviews.review_text: The Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner from the Rootist is quite literally the best conditioner Iu2019ve used on my hair. Additionally, the smell of the conditioner is really nice, and Iu2019ve received quite a few compliments on the subtle lavender scent that is left after I rinse. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner gives has a mild, delightful scent and gives my hair life! A small amount in the palm of your hand goes a long way. Yes, I do recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Soft and luxurious hair in a bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok. So I read Ultra concentrated, I immediately am concerned about how much the product will coat my hair and weigh it down or cause my scalp to start over producing oil leaving a greasy appearance. Well, you heard it here, from a professional perspective. I have been in the beauty industry for over fifteen years and this new, clean and fresh conditioner is like nothing I have used! Given my thick long hair, I found myself needing a substantial amount of the product per use, making it less cost-effective in the long run. One notable downside is the scent. Unfortunately, the fragrance of this conditioner is not pleasant. It lingers, making the overall experience less enjoyable than I had hoped. The strong odor was a significant drawback for me.  Moreover, I expected a more profound conditioning effect. While it did contribute some hydration, it fell short of delivering the deep conditioning I typically seek in a product of this nature. My hair felt only moderately moisturized, leaving me wishing for a more substantial and lasting impact.  Overall, this conditioner is decent, providing some conditioning benefits, but the off-putting smell, the need for a larger quantity, and less-than-expected conditioning level make it a product I'm not entirely enthusiastic about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A unique new product line on the market

However, using more than the recommended amount didn't make my hair feel any differently than it did with the smaller amount.) reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This concentrated peptide conditioner has been my new favorite hair product. I use this with the shampoo and it works great. This conditioner is color-treated safe. The scent smells like citrus. It has no added water and is concentrated. It says use half your usual amount but I use a little more than shampoo. This conditioner does feel lightweight on the hair and have had less frizz.  It also makes your hair feel hydrated, smooth, and healthier. I definitely can tell I have switched conditioners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this conditioner because my hair has been breaking very easily, but I didn't love it. Maybe with continued use I would notice a difference in the strength of my hair, but initial impressions were that it left my hair super tangly after (I have lots of blonde and extensions). I kept feeling like I needed more. And I was hoping to have that buttery smoothness but it just didn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by the Rootist, this conditioner is great for people that have a very oily scalp like me. I have a lot of hair that is also very thick and I had to use quite a lot more than shampoo. pictured below I used 6 pumps for my hair and I understand why the bottle of conditioner is bigger than the shampoo. over all its a nice conditioner but I wish it was just a tad more hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really did not enjoy the shampoo and conditioner from this line. I felt like they did not do much for my hair. The shampoo tangled up my hair and the conditioner wasnu2019t moisturizing enough. I didnu2019t feel it making my hair softer nor stronger. I feel like thereu2019s way better out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations. This conditioner is a game-changer for my hair. The concentrated peptide formula has noticeably strengthened my hair strands, making them feel healthier and more resilient. The conditioner deeply nourishes and hydrates my hair, leaving it softer, smoother, and more manageable. It detangles knots effortlessly and adds a beautiful shine to my locks. I also appreciate the gentle scent and that it is lightweight and doesn't weigh my hair down. Overall, The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner has become a staple in my hair care routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for stronger, healthier, and more vibrant hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very tender headed and have long hair that ends right before my buttocks, so itu2019s important for me to use hydrating and conditioning products to ease the process. Unfortunately, this conditioner did not deliver for me. My hair does tangle easily and immediately after rinsing, there was no shift in hydration. The feel and appearance of dryness was more apparent. I prefer when a conditioner leaves my hair smooth and silky after rinsing, as itu2019s more easy to manage and detangle. It was harder than normal to detangle and style my hair after using this. I personally wouldnu2019t reach for this product as a preference

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My initial impression was that the product wouldnu2019t last long because of its size. My hair requires a lot of conditioner because of its tight coils. I usually have to sit and massage conditioner into my hair for it to be distributed properly. I was scared Iu2019d finish this bottle so I didnu2019t use a lot. Honestly, I am not sure if I like it but Iu2019ll keep using it. It takes time for my hair to adapt to certain products, especially conditioners. My hair felt dryer than usual after I used this. The brand did mention that they intentionally didnu2019t add water to the shampoo + conditioner. So maybe my hair felt dry without the added water? I wanted to love this but itu2019s okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving this conditioner 3 stars because it was a bit difficult to work with.   First, it was hard to get it out using the pump, so I had to open the bottle. Unfortunately it got everywhere since it was also difficult getting it without the cap.   Second, the scent was very unpleasant for me. The texture is what I feel made it difficult to dispense from the pump.  Now, for the positive, It does have a texture Iu2019ve never seen or used before in a conditioner which makes it unique, a little goes a long way. I love the it made my hair very soft and it gave it a silky feel. It also made it super easy to brush afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is definitely a top 5 for me, one reason being itu2019s all natural. The smell is amazing to start with. Thereu2019s a nice slip feel to the formula as well. My roots were so clean afterward! Iu2019ve never seen my scalp so clean

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product a few weeks ago I can say that I love this product my hair y so soft and smooth love the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m Hailey, a gap year student focused on reinventing myself through beauty. This conditioner is a perfect part of the Rootistu2019s hair strengthening routine. The strengthening conditioner made my hair feel stronger after each wash, and minimized the amount of hair I lose when I brush. This product is perfect for anyone who whose hair is weak or damaged, perfect for strengthening and healing your roots. The smell of this product is mildly floral, and would benefit from an improved scent. Overall, I recommend this product, especially if you want to strengthen your hair and make it healthy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Confitioner from the Rootist did a great job to add shine and smoothness to my hair without adding weight. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so impressed with this conditioner concentrate, the packaging is beautiful, it smells herbal (in the best way possible), i know it is helping strengthen my hair, and i only need to pump about 4-5 pumps (which are teeny tiny amounts of product) to spread it all throughout my hair (and my hair goes down to my lower back) .. it has a silky creamy consistency when you rub it into the hair which is super nice and allows it to spread super easily. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner by The Rootist feels cutting edge and ready for the future of hair care products. From its smart packaging (recyclable aluminum) to its water free formula, this deeply intense strengthening conditioner is next level. Just a small amount, 3-4 pumps, of this concentrated peptide protectant really penetrated my hair with ease. Every time I rinse this product out of my hair (after letting it absorb into my ends for 5 min) Iu2019m left with silky feeling hair thatu2019s tangle free. I even noticed less static in my hair after using this indulgent conditioner. And letu2019s talk about the scentu2026u2026itu2019s soooo delicious. Like a light citrus vibe with a creamy perfume note that left me feeling so luxurious. Never did this conditioner weigh down my hair or make it feel greasy. This is definitely my new fav hair care line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a licensed cosmetologist specializing in skin care and pro make up artistry for over 25 years. The Rootist conditioner presented a new concept to me as I hadn't previously used a concentrated conditioner. I used half of what I normally would use for a conditioner, and it was enough to do my entire head.I detected a hint of vinegar fragrance accompanied by earthy notes, which I found not unpleasant. Using it after the concentrated shampoo yielded a remarkable improvement in my hair's texture. It enhanced shine, bounce, and hydration, effectively controlling my flyaways and frizz, making the styling process much more manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner is incredible. Its concentrated peptide formula strengthens and hydrates my hair, reducing breakage. reviews.review_title: I will definitely buy this product for my family

reviews.review_title: Silky smooth hair from a high quality concentrate
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was unfamiliar with conditioner concentrates but this exceeded my expectations. And it didn't strip my color! I love that it has ferments and peptides to keep my color treated hair healthy and I love that it comes in concentrate form. The smaller bottles take us less space and are easy to travel with also which is a bonus. Really excited to continue using this conditioner in my daily routine to improve my hair health.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Licensed cosmetologist of 9 years and I will never recommend this product at all. The bottle design needs some work on it. The whole line needs to be redone. The pre-scalp, shampoo, and conditioner had caused a few of my clients to have hair loss to their already damaged hair. The smell is awful and bothers my asthma. The conditioner texture is smooth and okay. A couple clients were super sensitive to it and complained of their scalps burning. This product will be recycled in a week. Iu2019m so upset over it because I just made my clients hair worse with this product and its counterparts. The product was hard to get out and had to use a popsicle stick to get the product out. Itu2019s thick but too thick. Super disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the privilege of being in the beauty industry for 30+ years and the opportunity to experience hundreds of cosmetic products. I admire Rootist innovative formulas that are biodegradable, sulfate free with no added water. They champion that roots, scalp and hair are all connected and their impassioned effort to lessen impact on the environment in the world of personal care is transparent and inspiring. I experienced a three part series, scalp treatment, shampoo and conditioner. Both shampoo and conditioner had a similar scent and were not good or bad. My impression was it was formulated for a unisex audience but reminded me of a strong vintage perfume. The sillage is impermeable, specifically for the conditioner. Both the shampoo and conditioner bottles are 4oz each but are two physical forms. One shorter than the other which is brilliant, when you have shampoo in your eyes it's beneficial to easily differentiate the two containers. Both formulas are very concentrated with only two pumps required (I have mid length hair). Conditioner is the most odiferous, a vinegar aroma combined with the strong floral scent was a little overwhelming. Hair felt clean and not stripped, but surprisingly my facial skin felt very tight after the runoff from the final rinse. I appreciated the styling outcome, hair had a lot more volume and shine but couldn't get past the lingering scent.

reviews.review_title: If you want stronger hair you must try the rootist
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Strengthen Concentrated Peptide Conditioner I loved the way my hair feels after I rinse this product off then blow dry, it leaves it super soft, moist and bouncy. it is concentrated with peptides, so it helps the follicles stay plump. As a Professional Esthetician and beauty expert for 20+ years I can appreciate that this product does way more for your scalp and hair follicles then just clarify and clean, for me it not only felt soft, and hydrated it really did help to rejuvenate my hair back to the way it was when I was younger, and it has given it back it's youthful glow and bounce. Love love love these results after just 1 week of use. After the 2nd week my hair shaft felt stronger, and my hair stopped falling out. Give this product a try you will not regret it.

reviews.review_title: An improvement after a couple of uses.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

This aligns with my preference for clean beauty products that prioritize both efficacy and safety.

reviews.review_title: best conditioner and shampoo iu2019ve used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: honestly i would never spend this much money on conditioner(and shampoo) but after receiving these to try for free, i can definitely say iu2019ll be purchasing this on my own. itu2019s a concentrated formula so no added water, itu2019s easy to apply and lather and i use twice as less product than i normally do. itu2019s very rich and makes my hair smell AMAZING.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using The Rootist concentrated peptide conditioner along with their peptide shampoo and I have been very pleased with how my hair turns out after each wash. This concentrated conditioner doesnu2019t require many pumps. Only a couple pumps will suffice enough. I have oily hair and I tried not to get the conditioner close to my roots as it is delivers a deep hydration. My ends are smoother and my hair is has less frizz. The conditioner has a nice subtle scent to it and a nice soft texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the whole collection. For best results use with the shampoo and before wash treatment and the last process fermented strengthen spray. I only use 3 pumps for my whole head. I have long hair. This can still be a conditioner that's affordable for all hair types. I have color treated hair and helped after the first wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a passionate advocate for hair care, trying The Rootist Strengthen Concentrated Conditioner was an adventure. The standout ingredients like the Rootbiomic Ferment sounded like a secret potion for my hair's wellness. It's like a multivitamin superhero blend, packed with proteins and mushrooms transformed through fermentation, giving my roots a boost and keeping my scalp happy and balanced.  The Bio-Peptides, or the hair superheroes, as I like to call them, with their collagen and keratin-rich formula, were like a strength training session for my locks. It felt like my hair went from meh to wow in terms of strength and resilience.  But let's talk coconut oil and Sodium PCA u2013 a dynamic duo that pulled moisture deep into my hair, not just sitting on the surface. The promise of reducing frizz, improving smoothness, and adding shine? It delivered! Plus, the absence of silicones meant my hair felt lighter and not weighed down.  What sets this conditioner apart is its concentrated formula u2013 no added water. Less waste and more power packed in each use. It's like a little goes a long way, and my hair thanks me for it.  Overall, this conditioner's promise of healthy moisture without the heaviness of silicones held true. My hair felt genuinely nourished, super smooth, and flaunted a shine that turned heads. If you're after real hydration and that extra oomph without the weight, this might just become your hair's new best friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from beautytap for my honest review. If your hair is thin and lifeless and lacks volume than this conditioner is for you. My hair is usually unmanageable and lacks volume but thanks for this conditioner my hair has come back to life. It has a lotion like texture and a little goes a long way. My hair is so shiny and healthy now. I can actually get a brush through my hair and when I tell you I have volume I mean that I actually look like I have a full healthy head of hair! This is definitely my new favorite conditioner and I'll be stocking up on it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My name is Dulce Iu2019m reviewing this product with my honest review, and I can tell you , I tried shampoo and conditioner and I love it so much , great quality. My hair looks so good so healthy, this product is fantastic  with amazing aroma I like so much how smell , beautiful scent . I feel cute because my hair is looking good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this conditioner for about two weeks and I love it! My hair is so soft and smooth. This has really helped tame my frizz and flyaway hairs as well! I gave this only 4 stars because I wish there was more product. I have very long hair, so I need more product to cover more surface area. That aside, I think this is a great conditioner for those (like me) who have very damaged and brittle hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin

Give this conditioner a shot if your looking for hydration, strengthening, and slip for textured hair.

reviews.review_title: This is a phenomenal product for your hair
